content: right click the folder, select properties from the menu and then the repair button.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Aren't you brilliant!! Thank you so much. That fixed 95% of the problem. In a few cases, the info. in the body of the e-mail has been switched. For example, the e-mail from my town telling me about the upcoming election shows information about an upcoming meeting at my church. The election info. has vanished and the previously deleted church's e-mail's information was substituted in its place. However, I can live without a few e-mails I think. thanks again.
creator: cahwhite

content:
Hmmm... seems like I have solved it myself in the meantime (thanks to chatgpt):

I deleted my hotmail-email account from Thunderbird and then added it again. Now it seems like i have two outgoing servers for Microsoft (see screenshots) and one is still operating on the old (flawed) standards but a new, second one automatically chose the OAuth2-option and I can send emails again.

-)
creator: konrad.sternisko
